resources.string: Tilisi on toimeton. Aktivoi tilisi jatkaaksesi BLOKADA+:n käyttöä.
Tämä ei vaikuta olevan kelvollinen aktiivinen tili. Jos uskot, että tämä on virhe, ota yhteyttä meihin napauttamalla yläosassa olevaa ohjekuvaketta.
Uutta tiliä ei voitu luoda. Yritä uudelleen myöhemmin.
Tätä toimintoa ei voitu suorittaa. Varmista, että olet online-tilassa ja yritä myöhemmin uudelleen. Jos ongelma jatkuu, ota meihin yhteyttä napsauttamalla yläosaa olevaa ohjekuvaketta.
VPN:tä ei voitu luoda. Käynnistä laite uudelleen tai poista Blokadan VPN-profiili järjestelmäasetuksista ja yritä uudelleen.
VPN:tä ei voitu luoda. Käynnistä laite uudelleen tai poista Blokadan VPN-profiili järjestelmäasetuksista ja yritä uudelleen.
Blokada Plus is now disabled on this device. Please select a location to reactivate it.
Saavutit laitteiden enimmäisrajan. Poista yksi laitteistasi ja yritä uudelleen.
VPN on poistettu käytöstä. Päivitä tilauksesi jatkaaksesi BLOKADA+ -sovelluksen käyttöä
Aikaisempi maksusi palautettiin, mutta tilauksesi on jo vanhentunut. Jos uskot, että tämä on virhe, ota yhteyttä meihin napauttamalla yläosassa olevaa ohjekuvaketta.
Maksut eivät ole tällä hetkellä käytettävissä. Varmista, että olet online-tilassa ja yritä myöhemmin uudelleen. Jos ongelma jatkuu, ota meihin yhteyttä napsauttamalla yläosaa olevaa ohjekuvaketta.
Could not complete your payment. Please make sure your data is correct, and try again. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Maksut eivät ole käytettävissä tällä laitteella. Joko Apple Pay ei ole aktivoitu tai emme vielä käsittele ostoksia maassasi.
Maksu on peruutettu. Sinua ei ole laskutettu.
Tätä ominaisuutta ei voitu asentaa (tai poistaa). Yritä uudelleen myöhemmin.
A problem occurred. Make sure you are online, and try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Blokada DNS on tällä hetkellä tuettu vain Plus-tilassa. Valitse toinen DNS ja yritä uudelleen.
Käynnistä ohjelma uudelleen, jotta muutokset astuvat voimaan.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
Turvallisuussyistä tiedoston lataamiseksi, meidän on avattava tämä sivusto selaimessasi. Napauta sitten latauslinkkiä uudelleen.
Swipe the notification left or right for settings.
Please open the app for details.
Please update your subscription to continue using Blokada.
Please open the app to unpause Blokada.
Blokada %s on nyt ladattavissa. Suosittelemme pitämään sovelluksen ajan tasalla ja lataamaan sen vain virallisista lähteistämme.
You are now using the newest version of Blokada! Remember, donating or subscribing to Blokada Plus allows us to continue improving the app.
Päivitystä ladataan nyt ja näet asennuskehotteen pian.
Blokada estää mainoksia VPN-konfiguraatiolla. Sinua pyydetään sallimaan se seuraavassa vaiheessa.
Blokada iOS:ille auttoi minua estämään %s mainosta ja seurantaohjelmaa!
Auttaisitko meitä arvioimalla Blokadan App Storesta?
mainosta ja seurantaohjelmaa on estetty asennuksen jälkeen
Valitse sovellukset joita ei pitäisi koskaan estää
Tämä pyyntö on sallittu, koska se on sallittujen listassa
Tämä pyyntö on estetty, koska se on estettyjen listassa
This request has been allowed, because it\'s present on the *%s* allowlist.
This request has been allowed, as it\'s not present on any of your configured blocklists.
This request has been blocked, because it\'s present on the *%s* blocklist.
This request has been blocked, as it\'s not present on any of your configured allowlists.
Kokeile käyttää laitettasi ja palaa tänne myöhemmin nähdäksesi, mihin laitteesi yhdistää.
For how long can we store your activity?
By enabling log retention you accept the privacy policy.
Blokada Cloud is not logging anything by default. If you wish to see the aggregated stats and activity from all of your devices, choose the desired log retention period below.
Adjust settings for WiFi and mobile networks
Tap here to modify default settings. To make the app behave differently on some networks, tap below.
Tap to modify settings for this network
The settings below are applied by default for all networks. You can override them for selected networks (in the previous screen).
Adjust what should happen when your device connects to this network.
Adjust what should happen when your device connects to a network of this type.
To have more control, tap here and let the app recognise all networks.
You may see a notification when Blokada reads your network name in the background.
Blokada will encrypt DNS if possible. This improves your security and prevents malicious actors to spy on what websites and apps you use.
Blokada will use %s as your device\'s DNS. Choosing the one that allows for encryption (has the lock icon), and is near to you, will help protecting your data and making your connection fast.

Blokada will use the network\'s DNS if available, or switch to %s otherwise. Also, the Encrypt DNS settings will be ignored whenever network DNS is used. Using the network\'s DNS helps to fix connectivity problems on troublesome networks, but leaves you unprotected.

Blokada will temporarily disable Plus Mode whenever network DNS is used. This is because it is not possible to access network DNS in VPN. The Plus Mode will be automatically restored when your device switches to another network.
Blokada will use Blokada DNS in Plus mode, to ensure high level of encryption and speed. You may change this setting at the bottom of the Choose DNS screen.
Blokada will always use Libre mode on this network, and ignore your Blokada Plus location. This is useful for networks where you do not want the additional protection.

Blokada can recognize networks you connect to, and let you configure separate settings for them. However, this app will collect location data in the form of network name to enable this feature, even when the app is closed or not in use. Sometimes you may see a system notification about location access - Blokada will only read the network\'s name.

Don\'t worry, if you lost or forgot your account ID, we can recover it. Please contact our support, and provide us information that will allow us to identify your purchase (eg. last 4 digits of your credit card, or PayPal email).
This is your account ID. Write it down and keep it private. It’s the only way to access your subscription.
Your payment method does not allow to control the auto renewal setting here.
Anna toinen tilitunnus tai palaa jatkaaksesi nykyisen tilisi käyttöä (tätä sovellusta ei voi käyttää ilman sellaista).

Verkkotunnusjärjestelmä (DNS) on miten laite tietää mistä löytää verkkosivustot, joissa haluat käydä. Valitettavasti suurin osa Internetistä käyttää edelleen salaamatonta DNS:ää, mikä vaarantaa selaushistorian vakoilun. Kun tämä asetus on käytössä, Blokada pakottaa laitteen muodostamaan yhteyden vain salattuihin DNS-palvelimiin (jota kutsutaan myös DNS HTTPS:n kautta).

Laitteesi muodostaa yhteyden suojattujen VPN-palvelimiemme kautta ja kaikki laitteestasi tuleva tai siihen tuleva kommunikaatio on salattu vahvoilla algoritmeilla. Tämä suojaa henkilökohtaisia tietojasi, kuten pankkitietoja tai henkilökohtaisia valokuvia varastamiselta turvattomissa paikoissa, kuten kahvilan WiFi:ssä.
DNS mahdollistaa sen kuinka laite tietää, mistä verkkosivut löytyvät. BLOKADA tukee vain salattuja palvelimia.
Use Blokada DNS in Plus mode

Selecting a location here will generate a config file that you can use in any VPN app that supports WireGuard. This is useful for platforms where we don\'t have our apps yet. Otherwise, we recommend using our native apps instead.
Device added! Download the configuration to use it on any device supported by WireGuard.
Blokada uses WireGuard. Configurations can be downloaded when creating new devices.
Blokada siirtyy nyt Plus-tilaan ja muodostaa yhteyden turvallisen sijaintimme kautta. Jos et ole varma mitä valita niin suosittelemme ottamaan sen, joka on lähimpänä sinua.
Piilota IP-osoitteesi ja teeskentele, että olet toisessa maassa. Tämä peittää sinut kolmansilta osapuolilta ja auttaa suojaamaan henkilöllisyyttäsi.
VPN-tunnelimme kautta lähetetyt tiedot on salattu vahvoilla algoritmeilla suojaamaan tietojen sieppausta vastaan luvattomien osapuolien toimesta.
Improve your privacy with DNS encryption. Blokada Cloud uses modern protocols to help keep your traffic private.
Keep your device snappy and your Internet connection at max speeds, thanks to our new Cloud solution.
Your battery life isn\'t going to be impacted, it might even improve when Blokada Cloud is activated.
Configure and monitor all your devices in one place. Either through our mobile app or our web app.
In addition to all the benefits of Blokada Cloud, you\'ll get access to our global VPN network
Suuri nopeuksia jopa 100Mbps asti palvelimilla eri puolilla maailmaa.
Käytä samaa tiliä jakaaksesi tilauksesi enintään viiden laitteen kanssa: iOS, Android tai PC.
Use the popular Blokada adblocking technology to block ads on your devices. Advanced settings are available.
Saa nopea vastaus kaikkiin kysymyksiin, kiitos meidän asíakastukemme ja elinvoimaisen avoimen yhteisömme takia.
We accept Euro, and the displayed prices are an estimate. A refund is available if your bank charges too much.
Your account is now active! You may now use all Blokada Plus features on all your devices.
Please wait. This should only take a moment.
Your payment is now being processed.

Credit card payments should not take more than a few minutes. Cryptocurrency payments usually take up to an hour, depending on what transaction fee you chose. In case of PayPal, it may take up to 24 hours. You will get redirected once your account is ready. You may also close this screen, and come again later. If you feel like your transaction is taking too long, please contact us.
To pay with your cryptocurrency wallet, tap the button below.
We are based in Europe, so we accept Euro: €10 is roughly $12.
This won\'t activate your Blokada Plus account. If you wish to use our VPN service, please subscribe instead of donating.

Sininen rengas tarkoittaa, että Blokada toimii.

Muista, että joitain mainoksia kuten YouTubessa, ei voida estää. Huomaat kuitenkin eron monissa muissa sovelluksissa.

Suosittelemme, että aktivoit järjestelmäasetuksista VPN Aina Päällä / Yhdistä Pyytäessä -kohdan.
Learn the basic information about the app.
Donate to help us continue the project.
Blokada is the popular ad blocker and privacy app for Android and iOS. It\'s being supported and actively developed by the amazing open source community.

If you want to efficiently block ads, trackers, malware, save on your data plan, speed up your device and protect your privacy with just one application, then Blokada is for you. It is free, secure and open source.
Works for all apps and all browsers
Source code available for Android and iOS

Our modern solution for mobile content blocking. Protect multiple devices from ads and tracking, and manage your preferences in one place. Enjoy zero battery drain, no noticeable slowdowns, and highly reliable adblocking.
Use on any platform supporting private DNS
For ultimate privacy protection, upgrade to Blokada Plus and connect through our VPN. We use WireGuard®, the most advanced VPN protocol, to encrypt your network activity and hide your IP address.
No logging of your network activity
All the benefits of Blokada Cloud
\'WireGuard\' and the \'WireGuard\' logo are registered trademarks of Jason A. Donenfeld.

Blokada does not track or share any of your network activity. If you use Blokada Plus, for technical reasons we need to collect the most minimal data required to keep the service operational. Please consult our Privacy Policy available in the top menu for details.

Blokada prevents apps and browsers installed on your device from sending your private data (known as tracking fingerprints) to the Internet. It also encrypts some of your network activity (DNS queries). If you need more protection, Blokada Plus makes your device connect through our VPN, and uses the WireGuard® protocol to encrypt your entire network traffic.

Blokada Plus is our safe and modern VPN (Virtual Private Network) service. It uses WireGuard® - a fast protocol with best-in-class encryption and low battery usage. Blokada Plus encrypts all of your network activity in real time, giving you the highest level of protection available. You also get the popular VPN features - hide your IP address, change your location, and unblock geo-restricted content.
Do I need to upgrade to Blokada Plus?

No, the upgrade is optional. You may stick to the free version of Blokada, forever. It is a recommended upgrade if you wish to increase your privacy protection even more, or need any of the popular features VPNs provide.
What is the Blokada Plus refund policy?
You can get your money back within 7-days of purchasing the subscription. Contact us through any of our apps, and simply mention you want a refund.
We are based in Sweden, where privacy is handled very seriously. Our servers are available in many places around the world.

Blokada Cloud is our new cloud based adblocking solution. It is faster and more reliable than the old method, and brings many additional benefits. Blokada Cloud can be used on multiple devices, and supports any platform compatible with DNS over TLS/HTTPS.
Blokada is available for several platforms, choose yours.
Currently, we do not provide Blokada for other platforms. However, if you are Blokada Plus user, you can use our VPN on Windows, Linux, Mac, and other platforms where WireGuard is available.
Blokada 6 is simply available on App Store.
This is our new, recommended version for smartphones and tablets with Android 7 or newer. It is simpler and faster compared to Blokada 4.
Blokada Slim is a lightweight version of the app, and it only contains features allowed by the Google Play policy.
We still maintain the older version of Blokada. It has more features, works on older devices, and TVs.

Blokada Cloud can be used on any platform that supports DNS over TLS/HTTPS. This includes Windows, MacOS, Linux, and all modern browsers. You can find simple setup guides for all supported platforms in the web dashboard.
Blokada Plus can be used on any platform where the Wireguard® app is available. You can generate a VPN profile in the web dashboard, and then simply import it in the app.

Blokada is not only the privacy app. It is also the community of people who care about their digital privacy and wellbeing. You will find us on our forum, where you can ask any questions you may have. We are also present on other social media and chats.
We base all of our work on the feedback of our users. Tell us what you think, what should we improve, or just hang out.
Here are some of the opinions from our users.
If you like what we do, consider supporting us, so that we can continue developing new features and improvements. This way, Blokada can stay open source and free forever.
If you like what we do, consider supporting us, so that we can continue developing our open source projects.

Blokada is an open source project, which means you can be sure it\'s always going to be free, safe to use, and without any hidden agenda. We believe this is the only right way to develop a privacy app you can trust.
Blokada has two sources of revenue for supporting the project development: subscriptions, and donations. There is no ads revenue. Blokada does not sell user data either.
However, developing a quality app like Blokada requires a considerable amount of resources. This project exists thanks to the support of awesome people like you!
and want to make Blokada better?
Blokada is an open source project dedicated to developing the best ad blocker and privacy app for Android and iOS. Check our Github, and let us know, if you need any assistance to make your first PR.
Upgrade to Blokada Plus to stay in control of your privacy.

Your Libre account gives you free adblocking on your device with our open source apps. Upgrade to Blokada Plus for an even better protection. You\'ll get access to our global VPN-network as well as our new *cloud based* adblocking that is more efficient and easier to use.
There are many ways to configure your device to use Blokada Cloud. Choose the one that works for you.
What type of device you wish to set up?
Choose any of the following setup options:

Note: The VPN configuration will use Blokada Cloud by default. Choose a different DNS setting if you wish to opt out. \'WireGuard\' and the \'WireGuard\' logo are registered trademarks of Jason A. Donenfeld.
Note: Native apps for Android and iOS do not support Blokada Cloud yet. We are working on the update.
In the Settings app, navigate to General → VPN, DNS & Device Management → DNS and select Blokada.
This feature requires notifications, please switch them on for Blokada.
You denied notifications. To change it, please use System Preferences.
The following is necessary for Blokada to work as expected:
Your device is all set up and good to go:
